mapper.select: select id, name, action_type, action, action_remark, testcase_id, page_id, element_id, option_data, type, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, sort from galloping_snail.t_step_ui_new where id = #{id}

select id, name, action_type, action, action_remark, testcase_id, page_id, element_id, option_data, type, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, sort from galloping_snail.t_step_ui_new limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into galloping_snail.t_step_ui_new(name, action_type, action, action_remark, testcase_id, page_id, element_id, option_data, type, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, sort) values (#{name}, #{actionType}, #{action}, #{actionRemark}, #{testcaseId}, #{pageId}, #{elementId}, #{optionData}, #{type}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{sort})
mapper.update:
update galloping_snail.t_step_ui_new
name = #{name},
action_type = #{actionType},
action = #{action},
action_remark = #{actionRemark},
testcase_id = #{testcaseId},
page_id = #{pageId},
element_id = #{elementId},
option_data = #{optionData},
type = #{type},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
sort = #{sort},
where id = #{id}
